findings.description: State rollback / replayable cooperative close (missing monotonic sequence check)
findings.reasoning: This is a valid vulnerability, but it is not the target vulnerability. It is a different issue related to the sequence check in consensusCloseChannel.

findings.description: ERC20 allowance race condition (double-spend via front-running)
findings.reasoning: This is a valid vulnerability, but it is not related to the target vulnerability. It is an issue with the ERC20 token implementation.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The target vulnerability (reentrancy in LCOpenTimeout) was not mentioned in the findings.

notes: The target vulnerability (reentrancy in LCOpenTimeout) was not identified in the findings. The findings provided were valid but not related to the target vulnerability.
